body_html:
@jinxin0924

Thanks for the quick reply. I followed the instructions on that thread and solved the issue by modifying the model_average_optimizer.py with your suggestions, maybe you should update the optimizer to include those changes?

However, now the chief worker is blocking just after starting the session. I'll try to figure out why this is happening and keep you updated.

Thanks again for your help!

body:
@jinxin0924 

Thanks for the quick reply. I followed the instructions on that thread and solved the issue by modifying the model_average_optimizer.py with your suggestions, maybe you should update the optimizer to include those changes?

However, now the chief worker is blocking just after starting the session. I'll try to figure out why this is happening and keep you updated.

Thanks again for your help!
